name: CaveRide
description:
Simple endress runner game, in which you play as cute monster riding through the cave, trying to avoid obstacles, collect coins and use power-ups! 
To move, simply use up and down arrows, or W and S buttons. 

The game is designed for mobile devices, but I made it playable on PC as well. Also, thanks to DamaDama for additional  testing.

It is the first game I ever made, so feedback would be appreciated !
